fr.liglab.adele.icasa.common
Interface StateVariableListener

public interface StateVariableListener

A listener which listens to state variable value changes.

Author:
Thomas Leveque

Method Summary
 void addVariable(StateVariable variable, Object sourceObject)
          Called when a variable is added to an object.
 void notifValueChange(StateVariable variable, Object oldValue, Object newValue, Object sourceObject)
          Called when value of a state variable changes.
 void removeVariable(StateVariable variable, Object sourceObject)
          Called when a variable is removed from an object.
 

Method Detail

addVariable

void addVariable(StateVariable variable,
                 Object sourceObject)
Called when a variable is added to an object.

Parameters:
variable - the new variable
sourceObject - the object which owns this variable. must not be null.

removeVariable

void removeVariable(StateVariable variable,
                    Object sourceObject)
Called when a variable is removed from an object.

Parameters:
variable - the removed variable
sourceObject - the object which owned this variable. must not be null.

notifValueChange

void notifValueChange(StateVariable variable,
                      Object oldValue,
                      Object newValue,
                      Object sourceObject)
Called when value of a state variable changes. Old value is equal to null if old value is unknown.

Parameters:
variable - state variable with the new value
oldValue - old variable value
sourceObject - the object which owns this variable. May be null (not all variables are attached to objects).
